channel.title: Big glitch that has been bothering me for years!
channel.description:
Big glitch that has been bothering me for years!! It's been there for so many years.
The trade doesnt work. Yes you can right click ~ Trade. Then you put your items, everything works. But the accept button doesn't respond! Nothing happends when clicking it, it doesnt go to the second trade screen...doesnt do anything. No reaction. Decline works fine. Any help how to make the accept button work?!
Thanks

Iv worked on this for years dude…so…yea…anyways i fixed it on my own bye

@parkview wrote:

Could you help me :s ?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 01, 2008, 02:48:01 PM[/size][hr][quote=“x spike x, post:3, topic:185475”]Lol, this actually only happens if the player you are trading with either logs out or teleports. Only way to fix it…hhmmm…freeze the player on trade mwuahah ! :D[/quote]

No thats not the problem…the accept button just doesn’t work
